name: node_xplain2sql
description: Makes a local compiled xplain2sql binary available.

scripts.preinstall: dir=$PWD version=5.5.0 && cd /tmp && curl -s -o xplain2sql-$version-csrc.tar.gz http://www.berenddeboer.net/xplain2sql/xplain2sql-$version-csrc.tar.gz && tar xvf xplain2sql-$version-csrc.tar.gz && cd xplain2sql-$version && make && cd $dir && mkdir -p bin && mv /tmp/xplain2sql-$version/xplain2sql bin/

author: Berend de Boer
